RT by @0xstark: We’re excited to announce the 2025 Decentralized Tech Summit, which @TheDRC_ will be hosting in partnership with @pro_jectliberty!
The summit will take place on April 2nd at the National Press Club in Washington D.C.
With growing alignment between Congress and the Administration on the need for comprehensive blockchain policy — and the potential for significant regulatory developments this session — the 2025 summit will focus on blockchain decentralization, emerging policy frameworks, and the broader ecosystem of decentralized applications.
See why this year is so vital, and apply below 👇
